sen.j: 淀君集（よどぎみしゅう）は、中村歌右衛門 (5代目)が選定した家の芸。
sen.e: Yodogimi shu refers to arts handed down from father to son, selected by Utaemon NAKAMURA the fifth.
Yodogimi shu refers to the arts handed down from father to son, selected by Utaemon NAKAMURA the fifth.
Yodogimi shu refers to the arts handed down from father to son, selected by Utaemon NAKAMURA the fifth.

sen.j: いずれも淀君が登場する演目で、五代目が得意としたもの。
sen.e: All the programs contained in the selection are ones featuring Yodogimi, and were best performed by Utaemon the fifth.
All the programs contained in the selection are the ones featuring Yodogimi, and were best performed by Utaemon the fifth.
All the programs contained in the selection are the ones featuring Yodogimi, and were best performed by Utaemon the fifth.

sen.j: 沓手鳥弧城落月（ほととぎす こじょうの らくげつ）
大坂城 (歌舞伎)（おおさかじょう）
淀君小田原陣（よどぎみ おだわらの じん）
醍醐の春（だいごの はる）
